#summary Showed using of tool as a quick overview.

= Simple steps of using =

 * Wrap all diagnostic instances by special wrapper.
 * At all points, where we catch exception, we can capture diagnostic information and use it. 
 * If exception happened, library system collect all information about and we can use it. For example, to log this data to file/console.
